content.webTitle: Travel news: A new life, in the Isle of Wight

fields.headline: A new life, in the Isle of Wight
fields.bodyText: People have been heading to the Greek island of Skyros - home of the original holistic holiday - in search of sunshine and self-improvement for 25 years. Now the Skyros experience (skyros.com) will be available closer to home with a new centre on the Isle of Wight. Based at the Grange country club (01983 867644; thegrangebythesea.com) in Shanklin, five themed courses are available; Creativity & Fun (learn how to write, paint, sing or perform a stand-up routine); Health & Wellbeing (rest, relax and pick up some healthy habits); Body Beautiful (diet, exercise and skincare); The Good Life (learn how to live the dream) and Love & Intimacy (build intimacy, enrich your sex life and learn how to flirt). The first course, Live Your Dream, starts on 18 March. Prices start from £225, rising to £395 in July and August.
